new_skill_specs.name: interpret_rainfall_graph
new_skill_specs.purpose: To interpret a graph displaying monthly rainfall data and identify the month with the highest rainfall.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The month with the highest rainfall as a string.

new_skill_specs.name: map_month_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: To map the identified month to the given multiple-choice options.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the option that matches the identified month.
edge_cases: Multiple options for the same month
